OrgName.entry: EMPLOYMENT OPPORTUNITIES - CHANGING LIVES THROUGH EMPLOYMENT

Desc.entry: An employer-led charity, which aims to promote the talents and abilities of people with disabilities and assist them in finding employment. Services to employers include advice on the employment of disabled people, guidelines on special equipment, facilities, adaptations and financial assistance. Also host sponsors for the Workstep Scheme. Home visits by arrangement. No fee. Self referral.
